clues: I swapped with a friend and doubled my stash.
On the bus, I gave a few to a kid who liked the shiny ones.
Later, I found an extra sheet tucked in a drawer.
Back home, I split them evenly with Daniel.
Then I lost some to a spilled drink on my desk.
reveals: At that point, the total was **35 stickers**.
Finding that sheet bumped me to **46 stickers**.
After sharing evenly, I sat at **23 stickers**.
After the mishap, I ended with **20 stickers**.
